channel.title: Theatre on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Theatre on mattischrome

item.title: Summer 1954
item.description: Summer 1954 is a pair of one-act plays by Sir Terrence Rattigan that are currently being performed together at the Chichester Festival Theatre. I really enjoyed both plays.

item.title: The Threepenny Opera
item.description: A few weeks ago, Ingrid and I went to see The Threepenny Opera at the National Theatre.

item.title: The Nutcracker
item.description: For Ingrid’s birthday, we went to see The Nutcracker performed by the Moscow City Ballet at The King’s Theatre in Southsea.
